name: PATLive Faxing

description: Send a fax with no machine
overview: Need to fax documents but don’t want the added expense of the machine, maintenance, paper, ink, etc? Hosted faxing allows you to send and receive faxes over the Internet without being tied to a clunky fax machine that takes up space in your office unnecessarily. Faxes sent via email or our website show up on the recipientsâ€™ fax machine as normal. We offer tons of features: â€¢ fax from up to 5 email addresses or from our Web site â€¢ add custom cover pages â€¢ set up and send to a contact lists â€¢ faxes stored on our servers so no need to print â€¢ message notification via email when you receive a fax, send fails, send successful, etc. Looking for more ways for your office to go green? Hosted faxing saves you money and helps the environment.
